"遺跡で蹂躙しませんかあ":
"Oh? Could it be that you've been taking
a break? That can't be good! You can't
go too long without causing suffering to
living creatures.

It's simply not healthy! Let's go to the
Ruins so we can kill and murder as much
as we want! I can't wait!
※ Como Ranger, con calificación S,
en Muy Difícil o +, solo con Lisa."
